data.title: Administrative Services Department
data.meta_description: The Administrative Services Department is comprised of Administration, Fiscal Services, Budget/Strategic Business Planning, IT, and GIS divisions that serve the City Council, Commissions, City Manager, City departments, employees and residents by providing: Accounting services Budget and strategic business planning Treasury and debt administration Purchasing Technology support
data.text:
The Administrative Services Department is comprised of Administration, Fiscal Services, Budget/Strategic Business Planning, IT, and GIS divisions that serve the City Council, Commissions, City Manager, City departments, employees and residents by providing:

Accounting services

Budget and strategic business planning

Treasury and debt administration

Purchasing

Technology support

Interactive mapping
